channel.title: How to install minimal Kicksecure
channel.description: How do I install a minimal Kicksecure environment? I don't need Tor, fonts or xserver but `kicksecure-cli` force me to install a lot of unnecessary packages. Is there anyway that allows me to install a minimal Kicksecure environment? I also don't need swap at all, why it creates a swap partition for me? I think we need a `kicksecure-minimum` metapackage without Tor, fonts or any thing like `p7zip` or `libgtk`.

item.title: How to install minimal Kicksecure
item.dc:creator: SteveK1978
item.description:
How do I install a minimal Kicksecure environment? I don’t need Tor, fonts or xserver but kicksecure-cli force me to install a lot of unnecessary packages. Is there anyway that allows me to install a minimal Kicksecure environment? I also don’t need swap at all, why it creates a swap partition for me?
I think we need a kicksecure-minimum metapackage without Tor, fonts or any thing like p7zip or libgtk.

Read full topic
